title: Review a Standard Vendor Agreement
description: An in-house counsel needs to review a standard, third-party vendor agreement for potential risks.

tasks.description: Ingest the vendor agreement (PDF) and extract its text.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully extracts the full text of the contract.

tasks.description: Compare the contract's clauses against the company's standard contract playbook for key clauses like 'Limitation of Liability', 'Indemnification', and 'Data Privacy'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the 'Limitation of Liability' clause is non-standard and unfavorable.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report flagging the non-standard clauses and suggesting alternative language from the playbook.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report with actionable recommendations for negotiation.
